document.full_text: the cleveland cavaliers finally caught a break after a nightmare 2010-2011 season when they were awarded the number one pick in next month's nba draft on tuesday.
document.title: hard luck cavaliers land number one draft pick
lines_and_colors: the cleveland cavaliers finally caught a break after a nightmare 2010-2011 season when they were awarded the number one pick in next month's nba draft on tuesday.
